title: WTB - Polar Bear PSA 4 or higher
author: T206Cards

posts.post_title: WTB - Polar Bear PSA 4 or higher
posts.post_content: Working on my complete polar bear run of PSA 4s or higher. Still need a little less than 2/3s of the set. Only interested in PSA, sorry no SGC or raw. Will pay a premium or trade in your favor. Please pm with anything you could part with, thanks!!!

[quote name="frankbmd" post=2145652][IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10338/bender-no-trees-pb[/IMG][/QUOTE]

Frank the strip tease Burkett
